name: Reckless Square
description:
Reckless Square

Reckless Square is a short 5-6 minutes long pixel action game.In this game you will play as a 2D square,who fights many enemies and bosses to accomplish his mission.In the game,there are 5 levels with their own design and game addons.

Ab Me

I'm beginner GameDev,and this is my first(full) made game.I got inspired by many games like Ghostrunner,Karlson etc.The music and sprites are made by me too.
